task.summary: Default task
* Extracted the Opus Primus PullQuotes Stanza
- added link to Opus Primus PullQuotes GitHub repository
- update copyright years to include 2015
- clean out test code
- copyright year update and minor documentation
* Added `=== Screen Reader Text ===` CSS section * Change to use `get_the_posts_pagination`
* Inline documentation clean-up and re-organization
* Incorporated WordPress recommended styles for `.screen-reader-text` class
* Added `hide_category_widget_list_items` method and related hook * Updated `hooks-filters.txt` file
- documentation correction
* Added `h5.comment-link` definition to provide a better aesthetic location
- prepared as 1.3.1-alpha (internal only)
* Change method to return the Featured Thumbnail versus outputting it
* Added some escaping sanitization and linked Featured Image to post via the post ID
* Begin removal of extraneous end of structure comments ... * Extracted code from `featured_thumbnail` method to create `featured_thumbnail_single_view` method
* Added `opus_featured_thumbnail_single_view_portrait` filter hook and updated `hooks-filters.txt`
- re-organized methods to read in a better flow
* Changed from using `get_the_time` to `date_i18n` for `OpusPrimusImages::exif_timestamp` method
- remove testing code
* Added styling to navigation for moving within a single post's pages * Improved look of navigation links mimicking the site page navigation
- Rare Disease Day 2015 recognition
- update to correct theme version numbers
* Added support for the `<title />` tag via `add_theme_support` function
- updated `readme.txt` with trac reference https://themes.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/23510
* Added sanity checks to ensure there is actually an image in use when returning the featured image view.
- update `readme.txt` for version 1.3.3
- update `readme.txt` for version 1.3.3
* Continue removal of extraneous end of structure comments ...
* Used a more specific element identifier for the SlickNav `prependTo` parameter
- update `readme.txt` with trac reference https://themes.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/23681
* Adjusted CSS to not reference `li` elements in default widget styles * Added `widgets` to the HTML5 theme supported items
* Continue removal of extraneous end of structure comments ...
- minor clean up
* Change `OpusPrimusStructures` to a singleton style class
* Moved the `support_comment` method back into the `OpusPrimusStructures` class
* Change `OpusPrimusComments` to a singleton style class - code reformatting
* Removed `$screen` parameter as not necessary in Taglines Stanza
* Ensure `$pagination` has been initialized in `OpusPrimusNavigation::pagination` method
* Moved the `before_comment_form` and `comments_form_closed` methods back into the `OpusPrimusComments` class
- code clean-up
* Change `OpusPrimusArchives` to a singleton style class
* Change `OpusPrimusAuthors` to a singleton style class
* Change `OpusPrimusBreadcrumbs` to a singleton style class
* Change `OpusPrimusGallery` to a singleton style class
* Change `OpusPrimusHeader` to a singleton style class * Renamed file to `class.OpusPrimusHeader.php` for consistency
* Change `OpusPrimusArchives` to a singleton style class
* Change `OpusPrimusNavigation` to a singleton style class
* Change `OpusPrimusPosts` to a singleton style class
* Change all classes to a singleton style
